name: DRYUI
summary: A tiny library that provides a better API for building and styling view hierarchies in code.
description:
DRYUI is a tiny library that provides a better API for building and styling view hierarchies in code.
DRYUI uses [Masonry](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/Masonry) for Autolayout, and works on both iOS and OSX.
